quote: There are three ways to ultimate success: The first way is to be kind. The second way is to be kind. The third way is to be kind.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: There are times when explanations, no matter how reasonable, just don't seem to help.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: Discovering the truth about ourselves is a lifetime's work, but it's worth the effort.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: The world needs a sense of worth, and it will achieve it only by its people feeling that they are worthwhile.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: Forgiveness is a strange thing. It can sometimes be easier to forgive our enemies than our friends. It can be hardest of all to forgive people we love. Like all of life's important coping skills, the ability to forgive and the capacity to let go of resentments most likely take root very early in our lives.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: I don't think anyone can grow unless he's loved exactly as he is now, appreciated for what he is rather than what he will be
author: Fred Rogers

quote: In times of stress, the best thing we can do for each other is to listen with our ears and our hearts and to be assured that our questions are just as important as our answers.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: I feel so strongly that deep and simple is far more essential than shallow and complex.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: The only thing evil can't stand is forgiveness.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: Taking care is one way to show your love. Another way is letting people take good care of you when you need it.
author: Fred Rogers

quote: Let's put a few little highlights in there to make them little rascals just sparkle in the sun.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Every painting is going to be different, and that's what makes it great
author: Bob Ross

quote: Go out and study trees. Make friends with tress
author: Bob Ross

quote: Anything that you try and don't succeed at, if you learn from it, it's not a failure.
author: Bob Ross

quote: This is your world right here and there's no right or wrong.
author: Bob Ross

quote: And let's give this big old tree a friend. Everybody needs a friend.
author: Bob Ross

quote: If painting teaches you nothing else, it teaches you to look at nature.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Let's just dance in a happy little sky today.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Let's make some nice little clouds that just float around and have fun all day.
author: Bob Ross

quote: You can move mountains, rivers, trees -- you can determine what your world is like.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Don't fight it. That's what it's all about. Just relax, be calm, be peaceful, but let it go.
author: Bob Ross

quote: These things live right in your brush-- all you have to do is shake them out...
author: Bob Ross

quote: If a painting makes you happy, then it's good.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Let's not make an almighty mountain. Everybody likes mountains.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Put some excitement in your world.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Clouds are about that freest thing in nature.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Let your imagination be your guide. There are absolutely no limits here.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Spend some time with nature. Let it become your good friend.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Things that just happen are sometimes more beautiful than things you really sit and plan.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Anything that you're willing to practice you can do.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Friends are the most valuable things in the world, and even a little tree needs a friend.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Painting should make you appreciate life and all the beautiful things that are happening around you.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Learn to take advantage of what happens. We call those happy accidents and they can be your best friend.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Just let these big old clouds float around in the sky and have fun.
author: Bob Ross

quote: You have unlimited power here. You can do anything on this canvas, anything...
author: Bob Ross

quote: Anything we don't, we'll turn it into a happy little tree or something.
author: Bob Ross

quote: You have to have dark in order to show light just like in life.
author: Bob Ross

quote: As you know, we don't make mistakes, we just have happy accidents.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Gotta have opposites dark and light, light and dark in painting. It's like in life. Gotta have a little sadness once in a while so you know when the good times come.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Don't be afraid to go out on a limb, because that's where the fruit is!
author: Bob Ross

quote: You can do it! I know you can.
author: Bob Ross

quote: I guess I'm a little weird. I like to talk to trees and animals. That's okay though; I have more fun than most people.
author: Bob Ross

quote: It's so important to do something every day that will make you happy.
author: Bob Ross

quote: We don't laugh because we feel good, we feel good because we laugh.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Didn't you know you had that much power? You can move mountains. You can do anything.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Look around. Look at what we have. Beauty is everywhere -- you only have to look to see it
author: Bob Ross

quote: The secret to doing anything is believing that you can do it. Anything that you believe you can do strong enough, you can do. Anything. As long as you believe.
author: Bob Ross

quote: It's the imperfections that make something beautiful. That's what makes it different and unique from everything else.
author: Bob Ross

quote: Just let go - and fall like a little waterfall
author: Bob Ross

quote: There is immense joy in just watching all the little creatures in nature.
author: Bob Ross
